author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...EMILIA STRENGTHENS A LITTLE AS IT MOVES SLOWLY SOUTH-SOUTHWESTWARD...
summary:
...EMILIA STRENGTHENS A LITTLE AS IT MOVES SLOWLY SOUTH-SOUTHWESTWARD...
 As of 8:00 AM MST Mon Aug 5
 the center of Emilia was located near 14.5, -114.1
 with movement SSW at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Emilia (EP5/EP052024)
